hp.Wiki: The amount of damage this object can receive before breaking. -1 means it will never break from damage.

defense.Wiki: The threshold compared against AtkParam field atkObj. If object damage surpasses object defense, the object will take damage. Otherwise, no damage occurs.

isCamHit.Wiki: If ON, a camera will collide with this object.

isBreakByPlayerCollide.Wiki: If ON, this object can be destroyed when collided with by a player.

extRefTexId.Wiki: The map ID of the TPF in which to source the external textures this object uses (if it uses them).

isAnimBreak.Wiki: If ON, this object will use a destruction animation when destroyed.

animBreakIdMax.Wiki: The maximum ID in the animation range to use for object destruction for this object.

materialId.Wiki: The material to use when this object is hit, determines the visual effect and sound that occurs. -1 means it will inherit the material used for the collision it belongs to.

isPenetrationBulletHit.Wiki: If ON, projectiles with isPenetrate enabled will collide with this object.
